channel.title: Taxes on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Taxes on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - International - Taxes - Filter and Quick Edit
item.description: BO - International - Taxes - Filter and Quick Edit Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO Login page is displayed Sign in to Bo Dashboard page is displayed Go to International -> Taxes Page Taxes Page is displayed Reset filter and get number of taxes in BO Number of taxes is above 0 Filter by id

item.title: BO - International - Taxes - CRUD
item.description: BO - International - Taxes - CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO Login page is displayed Sign in to Bo Dashboard page is displayed Go to International -> Taxes Page Taxes Page is displayed Go to add new Tax Page Add new Tax page is displayed Fill all information and click on save

item.title: BO - International - Taxes - Bulk Actions
item.description: BO - International - Taxes - Bulk Actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO Login page is displayed Sign in to Bo Dashboard page is displayed Go to International -> Taxes Page Taxes Page is displayed Reset filter and get number of taxes in BO Number of taxes is above 0 Go to add new Tax Page (create first tax) Add new Tax page is displayed Fill all information and click on save

item.title: BO - International - Taxes - Tax Options Form
item.description: BO - International - Taxes - Tax Options Form Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO Login Page is displayed Sign in Dashboard Page is displayed Change Tax Options to : enabled: true, displayInShoppingCart: false, basedOn: ‘Delivery address’, useEcoTax: true, Update Successful Message is displayed Change Tax Options to : enabled: true, displayInShoppingCart: false, basedOn: ‘Delivery address’,

item.title: BO - International - Taxes - Sort and pagination
item.description: BO - International - Taxes - Sort and pagination Steps Step Description Expected result Go to taxes page Page title contains ‘Taxes’ Sort by id_tax desc list is sorted by id_tax desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort by name asc list is sorted by name asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by name desc list is sorted by name desc

item.title: BO - International - Taxes - Pagination
item.description: BO - International - Taxes - Pagination Steps Step Description Expected result Go to International > Taxes > Taxes Taxes page is well displayed number of taxes = 32 taxes Change the items number to 10 per page 1 page is displayed (page 1/4) Go to page 3 page 3 is displayed (page 3/4) Change the items number to 50 per page taxe page is displayed (page 1/1 )
